title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 176.22 - Distance learning programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 176.22 - Distance learning programs

State Regulations

Distance education is defined as any educational process
based on the geographical separation of instructor and learner (for example, CD-ROM, disk, on-line learning). Educational providers who wish to offer
distance learning programs must have their programs evaluated and approved in
accordance with the provisions of this Part, specifically sections
176.23, 176.24 and
176.25
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
176.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
